===============

**Title (English):** Industrial Cleaning Services and Waste Management
**Title (French):** Services de nettoyage industriel et gestion des déchets.

**Reference Number:** MX-22660911075
**Solicitation Number:** BA230013_79293
**Publication Date:** 2023-01-18

**Tender Submission Deadline:** 2023-02-28 at 14:00:00

**Tender Description:**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites bids for Industrial Cleaning and Waste Disposal Services at CFB Bagotville and related sites in Quebec. The work includes, but is not limited to, pumping and industrial cleaning, collection, transport, and disposal of waste materials. Estimated cost: $270,000 for a two-year period, with a maximum value of $675,000.

**Security Requirement:**
The selected contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Procurement Information:**
This tender is being conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA).

**Tender Documents:**
Tender documents can be ordered from MERX by logging on their website (MERX : Find New Contracts, Bids & Tenders for Canadian Businesses) or by calling 1 (800) 964-MERX (6379). Amendments to the tender documents should be obtained from MERX only, as those obtained from other sources may not be the latest.

**Inquiries and Contact Information:**
Inquiries should be directed only to Alexandre Boily at Defence Construction Canada at (418) 321-7609 (tel) or email at alexandre.boily@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.

**Website:**
Bidders can obtain the results of contract awards from the DCC website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.ca). 

URL: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2390003162/abstract?language=FR

#### Notes:
There will be no site visit scheduled for this opportunity.
Each individual order should not exceed $15,000.
Only bids from bidders who ordered the tender documents will be accepted.
Selected contractors must meet security requirements outlined in the tender documents.
